comments: Professor Grossman is great. She is a tough grader and you do have to write a lot of papers. However, you will lover her class. She is never boring and is very interactive. I suggest having some background in religious studies or at least some knowledge in Judaism. You can\'t skip class, she will know and participation counts.

comments: I enjoyed the class. The assignments are pretty straight forward and she isnt a hard grader. She always answers emails promptly and will always help you whenever you need it. She super passionate about the material which definitely. Just pay attention, engage in discussion, and buy the books and you\'ll be fine.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: She is a great teacher! She knows what she\'s talking about and is very passionate about what she teaches. I enjoyed coming to class. The only thing to look out for is that you are very specific on tests and papers because she can be a kind of technical grader. But overall, she\'s great!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Professor Grossman is awesome. She seems like she is going to be tough at first but she really isnt. As long as you attend class regularly and do the readings you will have no problem at all getting an A. She is also the nicest lady every. She is super understanding and goes out of her way to make sure everyone does well.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Prof Grossman is awesome and a fantastic teacher. She\'s always willing to go the extra mile for her students, and is very accepting and understanding. If you ask her for favors and they\'re within reason, she grants them to you. Truly a great teacher and an even better individual. PS be prepared to read A LOT

comments: Prof. Grossman was a wonderful teacher. She is very intelligent, and really knows what she is talking about. Tough, yet very fair grader. Helpful when you ask questions, likes talkative students with opinions to share. Definitely a class that requires reading if you want to pass with a good grade, though.
